name: Akeneo - Fetch - Families and Attributes
description: This will fetch Families from Akeneo then further fetch the data of attribute and its options inside the transformer.

name: Akeneo - Fetch - Families and Attributes
description: This Incoming will fetch Families from Akeneo then further fetch the data of attribute and its options inside the transformer.

name: Akeneo - HTTP Client
Base - Family
Akeneo - Fetch and convert - Family attributes into Alumio Base attributes
description: This transformer will fetch the attributes data inside a family then converting them into Alumio Base attributes.

name: Akeneo - Fetch and update storage - Family Variants - Axes
description:
This transformer is a custom pagination HTTP call to get family variants.

It will then be save the family axes in the storage Akeneo - Family Variants - Axes.

name: Akeneo - Family Variants - Axes
Akeneo - Prepare convert - Labels - To localizations
description: Change labels from Akeneo into Alumio Base localizations

name: Akeneo - Convert - Family to Alumio Base
description: This transformer will convert the family structure into Alumio Base.

name: Akeneo - Fetch - Attribute by code
description: Getting attribute data from Akeneo using code.

name: Akeneo  - Check and fetch - Attribute options
description: Fetch the attribute options when the attribute is simple select or multiselect.

name: Akeneo - Fetch and convert - Attribute Options - To Alumio Base Attribute Options
Akeneo - Convert - Attribute Option - Alumio Base Attribute Option
Akeneo - Convert - Attribute - To Alumio Base Attribute
description: This transformer will convert the attribute structure into Alumio Base.

name: Akeneo - Map - Type code - To Alumio Base code
description: This transformer will convert the attribute code value into Alumio Base.

name: Akeneo - Check - Axes - Is Required
description: This transformer checks the super attribute using storage Akeneo - Family Variants - Axes that created earlier at **"Akeneo - Fetch and update storage - Family Variants - Axes"**.

name: Akeneo - Filter previous - Family
Akeneo - Filter previous - Family
CommerceTools - Send - Product types
description: The task that was created through Incoming **"Akeneo - Fetch - Families and Attributes"** will then processed further by the Route **"Akeneo - Fetch - Families and Attributes"** and will be send using this Outgoing.

name: Synchronize CommerceTools Product Types - From Akeneo Families and Attributes
CommerceTools - Send - Product types
description:
The task that was created through Incoming **"Akeneo - Fetch - Families and Attributes"** will then processed further by the Route **"Akeneo - Fetch - Families and Attributes"** and will be send using this Outgoing.

This Outgoing will transform the Alumio Base Families and Attributes into CommerceTools product types and check to create or update product types with the data from this outgoing previous iteration.

name: Alumio Base - Convert Values - Family - Attributes - Options - Localization localeCode into CommerceTools localeCode
description: Convert all localCode into CommerceTools inside the Alumio Base Family and Attributes.

name: Alumio Base - Convert value - Localization localeCode into CommerceTools localeCode
description: This transformer will convert the localCode value inside localizations into localCode that Commercetools use.

name: CommerceTools - Convert - Product types from Alumio base Family
description:
Convert into CommerceTools product type from Alumio base Family and Attributes.

It will call other transformer to convert the Attributes.

name: CommerceTools - Convert - Attributes from Alumio Base
description:
Convert into CommerceTools Attributes from Alumio base Attributes.

It will call other transformer to convert the Attributes options if exists.

name: CommerceTools - Convert - Lenum from Alumio Base
description: Convert Alumio base option into lenum value

name: CommerceTools - Check and send - Product type
description: Check and send they payload for Product Type

name: CommerceTools - Product Type - Akeneo Family code to id
description: Mapping Akeneo Family into CommerceTools Product Type

name: CommerceTools - Product Type - Full data
Commercetools - HTTP Client
CommerceTools - Prepare Update - Product type - Check name
description: Check the ProductType for name change and add to actions.

name: CommerceTools - Prepare Update - Product type - Check description
description: Check the ProductType for description change and add to actions.

name: CommerceTools - Prepare Update - Product type - Check attributes
description:
This transformer will check all the attributes for any change and add them into actions.

It will call several transformer to achieve this. 

Because the complexicity of how this work, please contact Alumio if you need any modification.
